comment:
* Callback to receive notifications when the Thread network states are changed. * *

Applications which are interested in monitoring Thread network states should implement * this interface and register the callback with {@link #registerStateCallback}.

methods.name: void onDeviceRoleChanged(@DeviceRole int deviceRole)
methods.comment:
* The Thread device role has changed.
         *
         * @param deviceRole the new Thread device role

methods.name: void onPartitionIdChanged(long partitionId)
methods.comment:
* The Thread network partition ID has changed.
         *
         * @param partitionId the new Thread partition ID

methods.name: void onThreadEnableStateChanged(@EnabledState int enabledState)
methods.comment:
* The Thread enabled state has changed. * *

The Thread enabled state can be set with {@link setEnabled}, it may also be updated by * airplane mode or admin control. * * @param enabledState the new Thread enabled state
